description:
The Transition Animation specifies a set of animations to play right after or during the page transition (depending on the "transition" property of the page).
The "to" property of each element specifies the animation to be performed on the element, by specifying a new value for animatable properties (such as "opacity", "rotate", "translate", "bc", "path").
title: TransitionAnimation

___opacity.description: Opacity of the element, between `0` to `1`, __animatable__

___rotate.description: Rotation in degree around the anchor point, clockwise, defalut is `0`, __animatable__

___scale.description: Scaling factor around the anchor point, default is `[1, 1]`, __animatable__

___borderWidth.description: Width of the border, default is `0`, __animatable__

___strokeColor.description: Color of the stroke, default is `black`, __animatable__
